mapper.update: update TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ set PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_INDUSTRY = #{productIndustry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SORT = #{productSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_SCGL_ID = #{productScglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_AMOUNT = #{saleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ENTITY_IDCODE = #{entityIdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_IDCODE = #{userIdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ENTITY_IDCODE = #{customerEntityIdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_USER_IDCODE = #{customerUserIdcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CIRCULATES_END = #{isCirculatesEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIRM_STATE = #{confirmState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACE_CODE = #{traceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACE_PROOF = #{traceProof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_TIME = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_MODEL = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_COM_USER_ID = #{buyComUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALE_USER = #{saleUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROMID = #{fromid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCKID = #{stockid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_XSPC = #{productXspc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_XSPC_SL = #{productXspcSl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJCHECK = #{zjcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROMZSM = #{fromzsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOZSM = #{tozsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_INDUSTRY , PRODUCT_SORT , PRODUCT_SCGL_ID , SALE_AMOUNT , ENTITY_IDCODE , USER_IDCODE , CUSTOMER_ENTITY_IDCODE , CUSTOMER_USER_IDCODE , IS_CIRCULATES_END , CONFIRM_STATE , TRACE_CODE , TRACE_PROOF , SALE_TIME , CONFIRM_TIME , PRODUCT_MODEL , BUY_COM_USER_ID , SALE_USER , IP_ADDRESS , FROMID , STOCKID , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , UPDATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , PRODUCT_XSPC , PRODUCT_XSPC_SL , CUSTOMER_ID , ZJCHECK , FROMZSM , TOZSM , UNIT_ID , JOIN_FLAG , HARVEST_UNIT from TTS_SCLTXXCJ_XSDJ where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
